text: "Owner of a Lonely Heart" is a 1983 song by English progressive rock band Yes, taken from their 11th studio album 90125. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada and the Netherlands, number 4 in France and Sweden, number 6 in Austria and Norway and number 8 in Spain. It was remixed in 2005 by Max Graham and went to number 9 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Dance songs Category:Rock songs Category:Yes (band) songs
title: Owner of a Lonely Heart
